summary: 2002 YAMAHA YZF-R6 MOTORCYCLE LEAKS ACID DUE TO A DEFECTIVE BATTERY. THE ACID SEVERELY CORRODES THE ALUMINUM SWING ARM, SHOCK, AND CHAIN...THIS CREATES A SEVERE SAFETY ISSUE, AS THE CHAIN AND REAR SHOCK IS VERY PRONE TO FAILURE WHICH COULD CAUSE AN ACCIDENT WITH SEVERE INJURY OR DEATH TO THE OPERATOR.   *NLM
